Hello World

-- GENERATE INPLACE BEGIN afunc("foo")
inplace.txt
pos=foo

-- GENERATE INPLACE END afunc
inbetween
        // GENERATE INPLACE BEGIN afunc("foo", "bar")
        inplace.txt
        pos=foo
        options: bar

        // GENERATE INPLACE END afunc

    inbetween

    GENERATE INPLACE BEGIN afunc("foo", opt="sally")
    inplace.txt
    pos=foo
    options: sally

    GENERATE INPLACE END afunc

Hello Mars
